name: Safe Deploy
description: An NPM package to deploy locally built Smart Contract from browser using Metamask wallet on a locally served webpage(on localhost with no external dependencies). No need of plug the private-key into the development environment.

name: Open Funds
description: An open collective alternative built on NEAR blockchain. It helps users to collect donation for their projects to continue work on them. The project data and user data is stored on Near blockchain.

name: Type It All
description: It's a typing speed checking web-app with a simple one minute test. I have integrated an API for fetching random paragraph for the test. Post test completion, the user can share their typing speed(WPM) on Twitter

name: Name It
description: It can be used for finding name for your new startup or project. Just enter some keywords and this will fetch related word using an open-sourced libraby. Clicking any card will redirects to google domains for purchase.

name: Solana Wedding
description: This is a blockchian based wedding registry platform which uses Solana Blockchain under the hood. It uses DEVNET which uses fake SOL for transaction. It sends minimum data to blockchian, making it cocst effective.

name: NFT Emporium
description: This project can be used to mint NFT on Poloygon, Ethereum, BSC and others with very simple UI. It uses Moralis as a backend, which makes it lightning fast.

name: NASA App(Frontend)
description: This project NASA API and fetches picture of the day in a weekly manner. It uses lazy loading of images and custom fetch to request data from API in small chunks.
